text: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver is an American late-night talk and news comedy television program hosted by comedian John Oliver. The half-hour-long show premiered on Sunday, April 27, 2014, on HBO. Last Week Tonight is like Comedy Central's The Daily Show as it takes a satirical look at news, politics and current events, but on a weekly basis. In September 2017, HBO announced that the show had been renewed for three additional seasons of 30 episodes each, keeping the show on the air through 2020. The fifth season premiered on February 18, 2018. ==References== Category:2014 American television series debuts Category:American comedy television series Category:HBO television series Category:American television talk shows Category:English-language television programs
title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver
